text: Gary Duncan (born Gary Ray Grubb, September 4, 1946 â€“ June 29, 2019), also known as Gary Cole, was an American guitarist and singer. He is best remembered as a member of San Francisco psychedelic rock group Quicksilver Messenger Service. He was also a member of the Ratz and the Brogues. Duncan was born in San Diego, California and grew up in Woodland. In June 2019, Duncan had a seizure after he had a "severe fall and hit his head." He died on June 29, 2019 in Woodland, California. He was 72. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1946 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Accidental deaths from falls in the United States Category:American rock guitarists Category:American rock singers Category:Deaths from seizure Category:Musicians from San Diego Category:Singers from San Diego Category:Deaths from head injury
title: Gary Duncan
